languages.text: "Мне почудилось, что звал меня не господин Руолдо, а мой брат. Но ведь Дана там не было, а значит я просто от испуга нафантазировала".
"I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
languages.original_text: "Мне почудилось, что звал меня не господин Руолдо, а мой брат. Но ведь Дана там не было, а значит я просто от испуга нафантазировала".

traits.locale_text: "I had a feeling it was my brother calling my name, not Mr Ruoldo. But Dan wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"I had a feeling it was my brother calling my name, not Mr Ruoldo. But Dan wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"It felt like it was my brother calling my name, not Master Ruoldo. But Dan wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"It felt like it was my brother calling my name, not Master Ruoldo. But Dan wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."
"I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

languages.text: 「私の名前を呼んだのは兄だと思ったんです。ルオルド様ではなく…でもダンはあそこにはいなかった…つまり、怯えたあまりに聞き間違えただけだったんです」
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: 「私の名前を呼んだのは兄だと思ったんです。ルオルド様ではなく…でもダンはあそこにはいなかった…つまり、怯えたあまりに聞き間違えただけだったんです」
「私の名前を呼んだのは兄だと思ったんです。ルオルド様ではなく…でもダンはあそこにはいなかった…つまり、怯えたあまりに聞き間違えただけだったんです」

languages.text: "Adımı seslenen kişinin Lord Ruoldo değil, kardeşim olduğunu sandım. Fakat Daen orada değildi, korkudan hayal görmüş olmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: "Adımı seslenen kişinin Lord Ruoldo değil, kardeşim olduğunu sandım. Fakat Daen orada değildi, korkudan hayal görmüş olmalıyım."
"Adımı seslenen kişinin Lord Ruoldo değil, kardeşim olduğunu sandım. Fakat Dan orada değildi, korkudan hayal görmüş olmalıyım."

languages.text: «Que era mi hermano quien me llamaba, no lord Ruoldo. Pero Daen no estaba aquí, así que he debido de imaginármelo por el miedo».
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: «Que era mi hermano quien me llamaba, no lord Ruoldo. Pero Daen no estaba aquí, así que he debido de imaginármelo por el miedo».
«Que era mi hermano quien me llamaba, no lord Ruoldo. Pero Dan no estaba aquí, así que he debido de imaginármelo por el miedo».

languages.text: “我还以为叫我的人并不是罗尔多大人，而是我的哥哥。不过，达恩根本不在这里，应该是我吓坏了，听错了。”
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: “我还以为叫我的人并不是罗尔多大人，而是我的哥哥。不过，达恩根本不在这里，应该是我吓坏了，听错了。”
“我还以为叫我的人并不是罗尔多大人，而是我的哥哥。不过，丹根本不在这里，应该是我吓坏了，听错了。”

languages.text: « J'ai cru que c'était mon frère qui m'appelait, pas le seigneur Ruoldo. Mais Daen n'était pas là, ce n'était que le fruit de mon imagination. »
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai cru que c'était mon frère qui m'appelait, pas le seigneur Ruoldo. Mais Daen n'était pas là, ce n'était que le fruit de mon imagination. »
« J'ai cru que c'était mon frère qui m'appelait, pas le seigneur Ruoldo. Mais Dan n'était pas là, ce n'était que le fruit de mon imagination. »

languages.text: "Ich dachte, mein Bruder hätte meinen Namen gerufen, nicht Lord Ruoldo. Aber Daen war nicht dort, also habe ich es mir in meiner Angst wohl nur eingebildet."
languages.original_text: "I thought it was my brother calling my name, not Lord Ruoldo. But Daen wasn't there, meaning I just imagined it in my fright."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte, mein Bruder hätte meinen Namen gerufen, nicht Lord Ruoldo. Aber Daen war nicht dort, also habe ich es mir in meiner Angst wohl nur eingebildet."
"Ich dachte, mein Bruder hätte meinen Namen gerufen, nicht Lord Ruoldo. Aber Dan war nicht dort, also habe ich es mir in meiner Angst wohl nur eingebildet."
